xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/951588-Bollyrobics: Dance Workout 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pqaVLRu5V5WoJAT82RkxMKZ65Yw.jpg Indian dance elements from well known bollywood movies are bounded to a rousing, sudorific, sexy choreography. Bollyrobics is a new kind of workout. It combines training of coordination, strength and stamina with a large amount of sensuality. The original soundtrack from Andrew Lloyd Webbers "Bombay Dreams" and the bollywood movie "Indian Love Story - Tomorrow may never be" provide music to 3 dances with a scaling level of difficulty and unique style varying from rhythmic-dynamic over playful-sensual to athletic-powerful. Each of the 3 dances are introduced by a detailed step-by-step program, warm-up and cool-down are shaping the workout. Bollyrobics: Dance Workout
